definition: "Becks", nickname of British footballer David Beckham (see 貝克漢姆|贝克汉姆[Bei4 ke4 han4 mu3])

sentences.english: Every now and then Justin and Audrey also love to doodle on the glass doors with markers.
sentences.chinese: 平时有事没事大小贝贝还拿彩色笔在玻璃上涂鸦。

sentences.english: Just uploaded a batch of pictures of halloween, Tristan is the almighty wizard! Got quite some sweets.
sentences.chinese: 今天又整理出一批鬼节的照片，小贝是小巫师，呵呵。

sentences.english: Representatives of Beckham confirmed he had not made the calls.
sentences.chinese: 经贝克汉姆的经纪人证实，小贝并没有打这些电话。

sentences.english: Mo is acted by Wang Shasha. She is a child star.
sentences.chinese: 莫小贝由王莎莎扮演，她是一个童星。

sentences.english: Justin and Audrey looked forward to everything and anything!
sentences.chinese: 小贝贝像是脱缰野马似的到处冲来冲去。

sentences.english: Perfect timing for our horse-riding outing at Tamshui.
sentences.chinese: 带著大小贝贝去淡水骑马。

sentences.english: Audrey, you have given with my life tasted the Xibei.
sentences.chinese: 小贝贝，用我一生尝尽你给的喜悲。

sentences.english: Bryan was enjoying running around the park without interruption from us.
sentences.chinese: 小小贝在公园里撒欢地跑着，没人阻拦。

sentences.english: It is obvious that the Beckhams will spend a lot of time to company their children.
sentences.chinese: 很显然，小贝夫妇花了大量的时间来陪伴他们的孩子。

sentences.english: Around this time Audrey was toddling around behind Grandpa.
sentences.chinese: 这时小贝贝跟著阿公东看西看。

sentences.english: Uncle Meng Feng and Aunty MJ gave little Audrey a toy puppy.
sentences.chinese: 孟风姨丈和MJ阿姨送给小贝贝的玩具狗。

sentences.english: Lily: Yeah, and her fame almost surpass Beckham.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，她的的名气快要超过小贝了。
莫小贝是佟湘玉的小姑子。

definition: Beckenham or Beckham (name)/David Beckham (1975-), British midfield footballer
Harper (name)/see also 斯蒂芬·哈珀[Si1 di4 fen1 · Ha1 po4]
Nana (name)/Nana (1880 novel by Émile Zola)/Nana (Japanese manga series)
lit. little princess/fig. spoiled girl/female version of 小皇帝[xiao3 huang2 di4]
Wu Zun or Chun Wu (1979-), Bruneian actor, vocalist of Fei Lun Hai (Fahrenheit)
